title: Zombiality: A Queer Bent on the Undead
description: A queer bent on the undead. "Zombies do't' care who you love ... they want to eat us all." This book contains 28 stories with a perspective on zombies never quite imagined before. These stories reflect a variety of queered lives and experiences and explor the depths of what a zombie is. From the traditional to the fantastical, these stories are sure to entertain all of humankind.
author: Bill Tucker
